page.title: 17CHANGING TIMES IN FLITWICK 2
page.content: {AN INTERVIEW WITH MRS.CRISP. MRS.CRISP WAS INTERVIEWED ON 9TH JULY SHE HAS LIVED IN FLITWICK MOST OF HER LIFE.SHE MENTIONED THE FOLLOWING. {PITS.}THERE USED TO BE THREE SANDPITS IN FLITWICK,ONE WHERE THE UNITED GLASSWORKS IS,ONE IN KINGS ROAD AND ONE IN BROOKES ROAD WHERE THE SHOPS ARE NOW.THERE WAS ALSO A GRAVEL PIT IN GRAVEL PIT LANE. {WORLD WAR 2.}EVACUEES CAME TO FLITWICK FROM EAST LONDON. THEY SHARED THE SCHOOL WITH THE FLITWICK CHILDREN ALTERNATING MORNING AND AFTERNOON ATTENDANCE THERE WAS A FIRE SERVICE WHICH WAS PAID AND A HOMEGUARD WHICH WASN'T. { {SHOPS.}THERE USED TO BE A GROCER'S SHOP WHERE FLITWICK JEWELLERS IS NOW. WINN'S ELECTRONIC SHOP USED TO BE A POST OFFICE AND WHERE COLLEY SAMPSON IS NOW THERE USED TO BE A BAKERS.
